hymn.title: In the church of Jesus there is love for you

layout.singingstanza: In the church of Je -- sus there is love for you, Love most pure and ten -- der, love most deep and true; Why should you be lone -- ly, why for friend -- ship sigh, When the church of Je -- sus has a full sup -- ply?

lyrics.stanza: In the church of Jesus there is love for you, Love most pure and tender, love most deep and true; Why should you be lonely, why for friendship sigh, When the church of Jesus has a full supply?
In the church of Jesus there is life for you, Warm as summer sunshine, sweet as morning dew; Why should you be fearful, why take anxious thought, Since the church of Jesus cares for those He bought?
